Tier 3 Readiness: Break-glass accounts present and safe

summary.name: Entra ID: Phishing-resistant MFA strength required for admins (Secure Score gap only)

priorities.title: Complete Tier 3 onboarding acknowledgements (lockout-risk controls)
priorities.why: Prevents ATLAS from enforcing high-impact controls safely until business impact is acknowledged.

priorities.title: Fix Tier 3 technical readiness (break-glass + phishing-resistant MFA readiness)
priorities.why: Reduces lockout risk and enables safe enforcement of Tier 3 Conditional Access controls.

priorities.title: Address highest-impact Secure Score configuration gaps (ATLAS-mapped)
priorities.why: These are the largest currently-detected gaps and typically yield fast risk reduction.

items.title: Ensure the customer lockbox feature is enabled
Deploy a log collector to discover shadow IT activity
Ensure Administrative accounts are separate and cloud-only
